text: Victoria Heyes is a fictional character in the Terrifier franchise. She first appears in Terrifier (2016) as a young woman who fights the clown-like serial killer Art the Clown on Halloween night. However she is disfigured by Art the Clown, causing her to go mad. She is played by Samantha Scaffidi in Terrifier, Terrifier 2 (2022) and Terrifier 3 (2024). ==References== Category:Fictional American people Category:Horror movie characters
title: Victoria Heyes
